name: Impetum Bulla
description:
RECCOMENDED: Turn down sound a bit, all sounds were roughly made with a blue yeti mic and various items I found in my flat, can be a bit painful at full volume.

WASD for Movement. 123456 for the action bar. Click the boss to hit them, allies or yourself to select for heals.

This was my final big project for my degree in Games Design and Development. In every project where I am given free direction to make what I want, I always challenge myself to learn something new or something that bothered me on the previous project and I went into this project to learn VFX. I now have a pretty basic understanding of how to make them, at least with VFX graphs but this project also faced a lot of other challenges because I more or less fully scripted it by hand instead of following tutorials. 

I'm quite stubborn and always try to use as little material that isn't mine as possible to avoid needing to make references. The ultimate lesson I learned from this was I really should stop holding myself back like that so much, as once I enabled myself to use Mixamo to get a model with animations, that huge hurdle was so much less of a problem and frankly, I was never into modelling/animation.
